Called to find out if the current user is allowed perform administrative actions eg manipulate spaces
boolean isUserAllowedContentStatus(WcmStatus status)

Called to find out if the current user is allowed to transition content in to the specified status Allows applications to control workflow
boolean isUserAllowedToCreateContent(WcmSpace space, WcmContent parent, WcmContent proposedContent)

Called to find out if the current user is allowed to create the specified content type under the specified content node.

boolean isUserAllowedToDeleteContent(WcmContent content)

Called to find out if the current user is allowed to edit the specified content Allows applications to implement ACLs
boolean isUserAllowedToEditContent(WcmContent content)

Called to find out if the current user is allowed to edit the specified content Allows applications to implement ACLs
boolean isUserAllowedToViewContent(WcmContent content)

Called to find out if the current user is allowed to view the specified content IF the status is not "public" they must also have the EDIT permission
